text: The command position is a spot in the bedroom that provides a clear view of the door and entire room, but not directly in line with the door.
Symmetry in a bedroom creates balanced energy in your bedroom as well as  equality and harmony in a relationship, if the bedroom is shared by two partners.

Feng shui harnesses chi, the life force energy flowing through everything. Strategic object placement enhances positive chi, like mirrors reflecting and amplifying abundance, such as scenic views or natural light.
The earth element in feng shui is believed to bring stability and grounding energy to the bedroom. Incorporate the earth element with natural materials and clay / terracotta.
